name: Dutch Courage from Highlands Bar and Grill
description: This genever cocktail from Highlands Bar and Grill in Birmingham is may look like Tang, but it's boozy stuff, with a wonderfully fragrant Satsuma juice base.
recipeIngredient: Garnish: small slice of a Satsuma or blood orange

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add genever, Cointreau, Satsuma juice, and orange bitters. Shake well and strain into an ice filled rocks glass.
